    • Method Detail

      • fetchJobFromQueue

        public Job fetchJobFromQueue(String status,
                    String workingStatus,
                    Node node)
        XXX locking synchronized Sets the objects status to working status. IMPORTANT NOTE: Fetch objects from queue opens a new session.
        Parameters:
        status - the status
        workingStatus - typically a numerical value with three digits, stored as string. working status third digit typically is 2 by convention.
        node - the node
        Returns:
        the job

      • getUniqueObject

        public Object getUniqueObject(org.hibernate.Session session,
                     String orig_name,
                     String csn)
        Retrieves Object from the Object Table for a given orig_name and contractor short name.
        Parameters:
        orig_name - the orig_name
        csn - the csn
        Returns:
        Object object or null if no object with the given combination of orig_name and contractor short name could be found
